biotools.summary: Produces a GFF3 file that clusters a list of transcripts using a sliding window. Cluster the data into regions (defined by size and overlap with next region) and keep only highest peaks.

bioschemas.name: clusterizebyslidingwindows
bioschemas.summary: Produces a GFF3 file that clusters a list of transcripts using a sliding window. Cluster the data into regions (defined by size and overlap with next region) and keep only highest peaks.
